name: Heartland Popcorn, Inc.
tag_list: popcorn, bacon-flavored, bags, boxes, butter-flavor, candy-corn, carmel-corn, cheese-flavor, chocolate-flavor, cinnamon-flavor, gift-sets, hulless-popcorn, kettle-corn, microwave-popcorn, oils, organic, popcorn-balls, popcorn-bowls, popcorn-butter, popcor
overview: Heartland Popcorn, Inc. is your ultimate one-stop shop when it comes to everything popcorn. We have the widest selection of popcorn products from the best and the biggest names in the popcorn industry. We sell different kinds of popcorn kernels ready for popping plus an assortment of oils, salt, and seasonings that will give your snacks uniquely rich and delicious flavors. Our store also offers modern and traditional popcorn machines and poppers for cooking, and boxes and bags for storing and serving popcorn. We carry instant microwave popcorn, available in a variety of flavors, for those quick and hassle-free snacks. Health-conscious customers can also try our certified organic and vegan popcorn products.
